name: Hail of Thorns
description: As you hit a creature with a ranged weapon, thorns erupt from your weapon or ammunition. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d10 Piercing damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
higherLevels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 1.

combatCost.condition: immediately after you hit with a ranged weapon
